name: Apex Online: Legends Strike 3D
description:
Apex Online is an Brand New 2019 3D Multiplayer Team Based Action Shooter PvP Game for Mobile. Experience action, where fast reflexes and TACTICAL skills are essential to success. Are you ready for the skill-based mobile shooter game?

Game Features:
- Multiplayer Lobby System
- Dynamic Cover System
- Beautiful 3d Graphics and Visual Effects!
- First Person Mode
- Cover Combat Mechanic
- Different Guns and Classes
- Upgrade Skills
- Customize Your Character
- PvP, PvE, PvZ Online Modes
- 2 Well-Designed Maps (Madagascar etc.)
- Achievements and Leaderboard
- Easy Controls

Game Modes:
- Team Deathmatch:
Teams battle against each other. The mission is to defeat the opposing team in score (killings).

- Capture The Point:
Teams battle against each other. The mission is to capture the point of opposing team.

- Player vs Zombies:
Join the Red Team and start surviving against in zombie arena. Zombies come in waves and will get stronger each wave with unique zombie types. Assemble your team!

Download Apex Online – new action packed shooter online mobile killing action shooter game today - it’ll be just what you’re looking for.

iOS 8 or later OS version is required.
